Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") FireShield = Tool:WaitForChild("FireShield") Special = Tool:WaitForChild("Special") Damage = 7
SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Handleslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = Handle SlashSound.Volume = 1
UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Handle UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Value = Player Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Parent = Humanoid end
function UnTagHumanoid(Humanoid) if Humanoid ~= nil then local Tag = Humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if Tag ~= nil then Tag.Parent = nil end end end
FireShield.Changed:connect(function() if not FireShield.Value then wait(60) FireShield.Value = true end end)
Special.Changed:connect(function() if not Special.Value then wait(15) Special.Value = true end end)
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit ~= nil and Hit.Parent ~= nil then local Humanoid = Hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local Hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid ~= nil and Humanoid ~= Hum and Hum ~= nil and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local Right_Arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (Right_Arm ~= nil) then local joint = Right_Arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle)) then Humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) TagHumanoid(Humanoid, vPlayer) wait(1) UnTagHumanoid(Humanoid) end end end end end)
function Equipped(Mouse) UnsheathSound:Play() local Character = Tool.Parent local Humanoid = Character:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid ~= nil then Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid ~= nil then SlashSound:Play() end end) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") FireShield = Tool:WaitForChild("FireShield") Special = Tool:WaitForChild("Special") Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire") Equip = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip") ArmsUp = Tool:WaitForChild("ArmsUp") Anims = {"LeftSlash", "LeftSwingFast", "RightSlash", "RightSwingFast"}
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
SpecialRunning = false
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function DestroyItem(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BaseScript") or v:IsA("Fire") or v:IsA("Smoke") or v:IsA("Decal") or v:IsA("Texture") then v:Destroy() elseif v:IsA("SpecialMesh") then v.TextureId = "" elseif v:IsA("DataModelMesh") then local BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black") local Color = BrickColor.Color local r, g, b = Color.r, Color.g, Color.b v.VertexColor = Vector3.new(r, g, b) elseif v:IsA("BasePart") then v.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black") v.Material = Enum.Material.CorrodedMetal v:BreakJoints() end DestroyItem(v) end end
function CreateFirePillar(Position) local FirePillar = Instance.new("Model") FirePillar.Name = "FirePillar" Debris:AddItem(FirePillar, 30) FirePillar.Parent = Character for i = 1, 25 do local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.Name = "FlamePart" Part.Anchored = true Part.CanCollide = false Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) Part.Transparency = 1 local FireClone = Fire:Clone() FireClone.Parent = Part Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Parent ~= Character then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) if character == Character or humanoid == Humanoid then return end if not Hit:FindFirstChild(Fire.Name) then local FireClone = Fire:Clone() Debris:AddItem(FireClone, 10) FireClone.Parent = Part end local Item = Hit.Parent if Item:IsA("Tool") or Item:IsA("Hat") and Item ~= Tool then DestroyItem(Item) end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(20) end end end) Part.Parent = FirePillar Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Position) + Vector3.new(0, (Part.Size.y * i), 0) end return FirePillar end
function Equipped(Mouse) Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") EquipTime = tick() EquipAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Equip) EquipAnim:Play(nil, nil, 0.7) Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and (tick() - EquipTime) > 1.7 and not SpecialRunning then if (Special.Value and (LastClick and ((tick() - LastClick) <= 0.3))) then Special.Value = false local TorsoPos = Torso.CFrame for i = 1, 100 do local Position = TorsoPos + TorsoPos.lookVector * (i + 4) local Hit, Pos = RayCast(Position.p, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), 6, {Character}) if Hit then local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.Name = "FlamePart" Part.Anchored = true Part.CanCollide = false Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) Part.Transparency = 1 local FireClone = Fire:Clone() FireClone.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(Part, 10) Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(10) end end end) Part.Parent = Character Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Pos) end end end Tool.Enabled = false Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local TempAnims = {} for i, v in pairs(Anims) do if v ~= LastAnim then table.insert(TempAnims, v) end end NewAnim = TempAnims[math.random(1, #TempAnims)] LastAnim = NewAnim local Anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(NewAnim) local AnimTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Anim) AnimTrack:Play() wait(0.5) Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" LastClick = tick() Tool.Enabled = true end end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" and FireShield.Value and (tick() - EquipTime) > 1.7 and not SpecialRunning then SpecialRunning = true local ArmsUpAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ArmsUp) ArmsUpAnim:Play() wait(5) ArmsUpAnim:Stop() FireShield.Value = false local NumberOfFires = 48 local Increment = ((math.pi * 2)/ NumberOfFires) local TorsoPos = Torso.Position - Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.y * 2), 0) local TorsoNormal = Torso.CFrame.lookVector Denom = (math.abs(TorsoNormal.x) + math.abs(TorsoNormal.z)) PosX = (15 * (TorsoNormal.x / Denom)) PosZ = (15 * (TorsoNormal.z / Denom)) local Pos = Vector3.new(TorsoPos.x + PosX, TorsoPos.y, TorsoPos.z + PosZ) for i = 1, NumberOfFires do local Angle = (Increment * i) CreateFirePillar(Pos) Pos = Vector3.new(((Pos.x - TorsoPos.x) * math.cos(Angle)) - ((Pos.z - TorsoPos.z) * math.sin(Angle)) + TorsoPos.x, TorsoPos.y,((Pos.x - TorsoPos.x) * math.sin(Angle)) + ((Pos.z - TorsoPos.z) * math.cos(Angle)) + TorsoPos.z) end SpecialRunning = false end end) end
function Unequipped() if EquipAnim then EquipAnim:Stop() end if ArmsUpAnim then ArmsUpAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
